entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:52 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 2:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -9.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
